description: Number of ways of placing 4n points on 2n X 2n grid so no 3 are in a line (solutions with either 90 degree rotational symmetry or full symmetry).
references: A. Flammenkamp, Progress in the no-three-in-line problem. II. J. Combin. Theory Ser. A 81 (1998), no. 1, 108-113.
links: A. Flammenkamp, Progress in the no-three-in-line problem, J. Combinat. Theory A 60 (1992), 305-311.
A. Flammenkamp, Solutions of the no-three-in-line problem (Incorrect table!)
A. Flammenkamp, Solutions of the no-three-in-line problem
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms (from Flammenkamp) from _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 24 2005
Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Aug 29 2008 at the suggestion of R. J. Mathar
